# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(guise-server-lib STATIC 
  address.c
  cipher.c
  req_challenge.c
  req_login.c
  req_session_query.c
  server.c
  unique_id.c
  user_session.c
  user_sessions.c
  users.c)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR})
include(Tornado)
set_tornado(guise-server-lib)

target_include_directories(guise-server-lib PUBLIC ../include)

target_link_libraries(guise-server-lib 
  PUBLIC guise-serialize
  PUBLIC imprint
  PUBLIC monotonic-time
  PUBLIC secure-random)
